resource: 1001992.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001992.vtc=true 1001992.description=Rebate offered by Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A., Inc. Rebate will be applied on lease contracts, first toward the amounts due at lease signing or delivery, with any remainder to the capitalized cost reduction. One rebate per lease transaction. Not compatible with Toyota College Rebate Program. Lease contract must be dated by January 3, 2011. Toyota Military Rebate Program is available on approved credit to qualified customers leasing new untitled Toyota models through participating Toyota dealers and Toyota Financial Services. Some restrictions apply. Program may not be available in all states and is subject to change or termination at any time. Not all applicants will qualify.  1001992.derived=false
